p: There were seven ZIKV studies. The first study was conducted in Yap Island during the 2007 outbreak [ 8], and the second study was conducted in Zambia in 2013 [ 156], where no information on ZIKV was available. Two studies were conducted in French Polynesia in two distinct populations during and after the 2014 outbreak and one in 2015 [ 155]. Another study was conducted in Cameroon in 2015 [ 158], and one study was conducted in 2016 in Martinique (West Indies) [ 159]. Finally, the last study was conducted in French Guiana during the ZIKV outbreak in 2016 [ 160].
